abstract: Auto Racing Roundup; Tony Stewart wins Tums Fast Relief 500 at Martinsville Speedway, moving him to second place in Nascar Chase for the Sprint Cup; other racing news noted.
snippet: Tony Stewart’s victory at Martinsville, Va., moved him to second place, 8 points behind Carl Edwards, with three races left in the Nascar Chase for the Sprint Cup.
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart’s victory at Martinsville, Va., moved him to second place, 8 points behind Carl Edwards, with three races left in the Nascar Chase for the Sprint Cup.

headline.main: Daring Pass Lifts Stewart to Contention
headline.print_headline: Daring Pass Lifts Stewart To Contention
headline.seo: Nascar: Stewart Wins at Martinsville and Surges Into Contention for Title
